title: Patch 6.23 Issues
body: I opened the league client and clicked "Launch". After that, it said that it needed to patch. It started patching and went on for about an hour. I decided to close it since it was taking longer than usual. I uninstalled and reinstalled the game. When I opened it after reinstalling, I clicked "Launch", then it said "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client to try again. Please help...

replies.body: I reinstalled using the Hextech Repair Tool, which I found on the support page. I was able to fix the problem by deleting the desktop icon, since every time I would open, it would say that the desktop icon must be updated. I would still like to know how to keep the "updated" desktop icon and still be able to open the client. Thank you...
That's weird, the Alpha doesn't exist anymore.. When you reinstalled, did you delete **everything** and reinstall or did you try to reinstall just the Beta Files?
